# SummitUI

> A Blazor component library focused on WCAG-compliant, fully customizable headless components for .NET applications.

SummitUI provides accessible, unstyled UI components for Blazor applications. All components work across WebAssembly, Server-Side Rendering (SSR), and Interactive Server render modes.

## Key Concepts

- **Headless Components**: No default styling, full CSS control via data attributes
- **WCAG 2.1 Compliant**: Proper ARIA attributes, roles, and keyboard navigation built-in
- **Data Attributes for Styling**: Use `data-state`, `data-disabled`, `data-orientation` for CSS selectors
- **Controlled & Uncontrolled**: All components support both patterns
- **Cross-Render-Mode**: Works with Blazor WASM, SSR, and Interactive Server
- **Localization**: Customizable ARIA labels and screen reader announcements via ISummitUILocalizer

## Installation

```bash
dotnet add package SummitUI
```

## Component Documentation

- [Accordion](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AndreHogberg/summit-ui/main/docs/accordion.md): Collapsible content sections with keyboard navigation
- [Checkbox](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AndreHogberg/summit-ui/main/docs/checkbox.md): Toggle control with indeterminate state support
- [DateField](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AndreHogberg/summit-ui/main/docs/datefield.md): Date input with segment-based editing
- [DropdownMenu](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AndreHogberg/summit-ui/main/docs/dropdownmenu.md): Context menus with items, checkboxes, and radio groups
- [Popover](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AndreHogberg/summit-ui/main/docs/popover.md): Floating content panels with flexible positioning
- [Select](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AndreHogberg/summit-ui/main/docs/select.md): Dropdown selection with full accessibility
- [Separator](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AndreHogberg/summit-ui/main/docs/separator.md): Visually or semantically separates content
- [Switch](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AndreHogberg/summit-ui/main/docs/switch.md): Binary toggle control
- [Tabs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AndreHogberg/summit-ui/main/docs/tabs.md): Tabbed interface with keyboard navigation

## Utilities

- [FocusTrap](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AndreHogberg/summit-ui/main/docs/focustrap.md): Utility to trap keyboard focus within a container

## Localization

SummitUI uses `ISummitUILocalizer` for accessibility strings (ARIA labels, screen reader announcements). The library ships with English defaults.

### Resource Keys

| Key | Default | Used By |
|-----|---------|---------|
| Dialog_CloseLabel | "Close dialog" | SmDialogClose, SmPopoverClose |
| Popover_CloseLabel | "Close" | SmPopoverClose |
| Combobox_ClearAllLabel | "Clear all selections" | SmComboboxClear |
| Calendar_NextMonthLabel | "Next month" | SmCalendarNextButton |
| Calendar_PreviousMonthLabel | "Previous month" | SmCalendarPrevButton |
| Calendar_GridInstructions | "Use arrow keys to navigate dates, Enter or Space to select" | SmCalendarGrid |
| Calendar_DateSelectedAnnouncement | "{0} selected" | CalendarContext |
| DateField_YearLabel | "Year" | SmDateFieldInput |
| DateField_MonthLabel | "Month" | SmDateFieldInput |
| DateField_DayLabel | "Day" | SmDateFieldInput |
| DateField_HourLabel | "Hour" | SmDateFieldInput |
| DateField_MinuteLabel | "Minute" | SmDateFieldInput |
| DateField_DayPeriodLabel | "AM/PM" | SmDateFieldInput |

### Custom Localizer

```csharp
// Implement ISummitUILocalizer
public class SwedishLocalizer : ISummitUILocalizer
{
    private readonly Dictionary<string, string> _translations = new()
    {
        ["Dialog_CloseLabel"] = "Stäng dialogrutan",
        ["Calendar_NextMonthLabel"] = "Nästa månad",
        // ... other keys
    };

    public string this[string key] => 
        _translations.TryGetValue(key, out var value) ? value : key;

    public string this[string key, params object[] arguments] => 
        string.Format(this[key], arguments);
}

// Register after AddSummitUI()
builder.Services.AddSummitUI();
builder.Services.AddSingleton<ISummitUILocalizer, SwedishLocalizer>();
```

### User-Facing Text

Some components require user-facing text as parameters (not localized by the library):

```csharp
// AlertDialog requires button text
await AlertDialogService.ConfirmAsync("Delete item?", new AlertDialogOptions
{
    Title = "Confirm Delete",
    ConfirmText = "Delete",   // Required - provide localized text
    CancelText = "Cancel",    // Required - provide localized text
    IsDestructive = true
});
```

## Common Patterns

### Controlled vs Uncontrolled

```razor
@* Uncontrolled (internal state) *@
<AccordionRoot DefaultValue="item-1">...</AccordionRoot>

@* Controlled (external state) *@
<AccordionRoot Value="@expandedItem" ValueChanged="@(v => expandedItem = v)">...</AccordionRoot>
```

### Styling with Data Attributes

All components expose data attributes for CSS styling:

```css
/* Style based on state */
[data-state="open"] { background-color: #f0f0f0; }
[data-state="closed"] { background-color: white; }

/* Style disabled elements */
[data-disabled] { opacity: 0.5; cursor: not-allowed; }

/* Style based on orientation */
[data-orientation="vertical"] { flex-direction: column; }
[data-orientation="horizontal"] { flex-direction: row; }
```

### Overlay Close Animations

Overlays stay mounted until close animations finish. To avoid a flash after the
animate-out ends, keep the closed state transparent:

```css
/* Example for Dialog/Popover overlays */
[data-state="closed"] { opacity: 0; }
```

### Custom Element Rendering

Most components support the `As` parameter to render as different HTML elements:

```razor
<AccordionHeader As="h2" Level="2">...</AccordionHeader>
<PopoverTrigger As="div">...</PopoverTrigger>
```

## Project Structure

```
SummitUI/
├── src/SummitUI/                    # Main component library
│   ├── Components/                  # All component implementations
│   │   ├── Accordion/              # Accordion component files
│   │   ├── Checkbox/               # Checkbox component files
│   │   ├── DateField/              # DateField component files
│   │   ├── DropdownMenu/           # DropdownMenu component files
│   │   ├── Popover/                # Popover component files
│   │   ├── Select/                 # Select component files
│   │   ├── Switch/                 # Switch component files
│   │   ├── Tabs/                   # Tabs component files
│   │   └── Utilities/              # Utility components (FocusTrap)
│   ├── Localization/               # ISummitUILocalizer interface and implementation
│   ├── Resources/                  # SummitUIResources.resx (English defaults)
│   ├── Interop/                    # JavaScript interop classes
│   └── Scripts/                    # JavaScript modules
├── docs/                           # Component documentation (markdown)
└── tests/                          # Test projects
```
